Package com.cercalia.sdk.model.staticmaps

Class RGBAColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cercalia.sdk.model.staticmaps.RGBAColor
  • public final class RGBAColor
extends Object
    Represents an RGBA color for static map shapes.
